home.title: Home
home.heroDescription: With years of experience in web development, I specialize in building and architecting Salesforce applications, focused on B2B e-commerce for national and international clients. I lead front-end teams, collaborating with different squads to deliver efficient and scalable solutions.
home.summaryText: Front-End Tech Lead with solid experience in web development and Salesforce application architecture. My work goes beyond code: I participate in strategic meetings, use agile methodologies, and contribute to technical decisions. I meet directly with clients and DevOps teams, ensuring solutions are aligned with business needs. Committed to best practices, quality, performance, and innovation, I currently also build features and projects with artificial intelligence, using AI agents to ensure better quality, testing, agility, and scalability.

project1.name: All in One (AIO)
project1.description: Robust Salesforce portal with over 90 pages, serving as both an e-commerce platform and B2B portal. Enables retailers to purchase products, access promotions, and earn discounts. Additionally, retailers can join benefit programs, accumulating points redeemable for prizes. Deployed across 5 markets — Brazil, Chile, Romania, South Africa, and Poland — each with unique features tailored to local customer needs.
project1.techs: Salesforce LWC, Apex, JavaScript, CSS, SOQL

project2.name: Commerce Lite
project2.description: Lightweight Salesforce portal enabling BAT retailers to purchase products, access promotions, and track orders in a streamlined interface. An agile and efficient solution deployed across Brazil, Poland, Malaysia, and South Africa.
project2.techs: Salesforce Aura Component, Apex, JavaScript, CSS

project3.name: OmniRep
project3.description: Salesforce portal designed for BAT sales representatives, featuring visual charts for sales and purchase data organized by hierarchy — Area, Regional, Territory, and Retailer. Deployed in Brazil, South Africa, and New Zealand.

project4.name: Commerce IQ (AIO)
project4.description: Smart feature integrated into All in One, offering products based on intelligent metrics. An engine classifies products for retailers, including: frequently purchased together items, similar products, and items not yet purchased. The portal displays these in dynamic carousels with hover interactions revealing personalized recommendations. Active in Brazil, Chile, and South Africa.
project4.techs: Salesforce LWC, Apex, JavaScript, CSS, SOQL

project5.name: Promotions (AIO)
project5.description: Feature within All in One for offering promotions on retailer purchases. Promotions are registered through an admin portal and synced to Salesforce. Users can combine multiple promotions with distinct targets and rewards, plus progressive achievement levels — the higher the target, the greater the reward. Retailers track their targets, view progress, and confirm rewards. Deployed in Brazil, Chile, and South Africa.
project5.techs: Salesforce LWC, Apex, JavaScript, CSS, SOQL, Grails, ZK

project6.name: BAT Elite
project6.description: Project integrated with All in One (Romania) from Salesforce, but built outside the Salesforce ecosystem. A B2B portal allowing users to accumulate points by achieving goals through various engagement dynamics, and redeem those points for prizes. Currently operating in the Romanian market.

project7.name: B2B Commerce
project7.description: E-commerce portal within Salesforce for retailers, enabling product purchases linked to promotional mechanics with various discount dynamics displayed in real time. The major technical challenge was working with the CloudCraze framework, due to its inherent specificities and complexity.

curiosities.title: Curiosities
curiosities.subtitle: Fun facts and interests about me

item1.title: Football Lover
item1.description: I've been following football for as long as I can remember. I love watching competitions from around the world and get even more excited during World Cup season — a true sports enthusiast.

item2.title: Music
item2.description: I'm passionate about music, especially classic rock and the great hits from the 70s and 80s. A good playlist is always the perfect companion for my day.

item3.title: Friendship
item3.description: I truly value being with friends. Getting the crew together for great conversation, delicious food, and a cold beer is one of my greatest joys.

item4.title: Gaming
item4.description: I enjoy video games, especially classics like FIFA, Mortal Kombat, and Need for Speed. I'm a retro gaming fan — Street Fighter, The King of Fighters, Gran Turismo, and other PS1 and Mega Drive titles.

item5.title: Continuous Learning
item5.description: Every day I dedicate time to learning something new, even outside my field. Curiosity is the engine that keeps me constantly evolving.

item6.title: Adaptability
item6.description: I adapt easily to any environment or challenge. I can handle virtually any task I'm taught and I make friends easily with all kinds of people.

item7.title: Family
item7.description: I love my family. My world revolves around my wife Fernanda and our dog Malu. Enjoying every moment with them is what makes me happiest.

item8.title: Travel
item8.description: I love discovering new places and living every moment of a trip to the fullest. When it's time to go back, I always wish I could stay a little longer.

item9.title: Driving
item9.description: Surprisingly, I really enjoy hitting the road — alone or with family. Driving relaxes me and makes me feel great. I'm also a fan of classic cars; if I could, I'd own a vintage model just as a hobby.
